subject: ReactClassBased
question:
With recent React versions, it is possible to import CSS modules without ejecting the project. If "react-scripts" are greater than 2.0, then you could do it just by importing the CSS module.
What would be the code update to apply the class .red to the button below? 
import free_name_style from './ChildComponent.css';
...
	<button className="">Click me</button>
...
answer: import free_name_style from './ChildComponent.module.css'; ... <button className={ free_name_style.red}>Click me</button> ...
